name: NAFO Fellas Tournament
description:
Submission to GDevelop game jam #2

A card fighting game featuring the NAFO fellas.

You want to know more about NAFO Fellas?

Marking on the cards

         

When the Combo reaches 6, an attack with a value between 10 and 20 is activated.

In game background images from various wallpaper sites.

Music - HorrorPen  Jobromedia

Fellas graphic - Gr1mRea9er from NAFO
